Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsPhotos taken from cell phone in longview wa on Nichols blvd saw red lights likevthree fire balls got out of patrol car and saw a craft floating silently crossing tree line then hovered on 18th ave and Nichols blvd I shined my spotlight on it and it begun humming buzzing louder then s power line begun turning grey color almost to a t like a cloud smelled of sulfur air felt electriclly charged then surged in sound and begun getting brighter and zoomed off at about 800 mph from a dead stop heading into Oregon from Washington state it was crazy three black two bladed helicopters following fast but they made no sound at all usally chinook helicopters are very loud these were silent can't leave name do to my job or be contacted about this report at all... were informed to never report these or comment in any way about these reports which I feel is wrong officals make people feel crazy when reporting these sightings when really one time or another we've all seen them this was my first so close about 20ft above my head no joke look at photos. Also three black crown vics and a newer Chevy tahoe followed below on ground following craft plates were white and said government in blue at top and an anchor on left side in front of plate number truer to run plate came back on ncic as UN Authorized to check plate with a phone number then dispatch supervisor wanted to know why I was running that plate sounded like someone was thier asking him questions in background and giving questions to ask I stated at approx 18:35 that vehical ran a red light and thought he was 10-26 dui......

Summary: was flying straight line looked like fireballs then turned into a cloud like color went silent and hovered after i shined my spotlight on it from patrol car made a buzzing sound then almost looked like a cloud smelled of sulfur shut down street lights
